name: bvg-rest
description: An HTTP API for Berlin & Brandenburg public transport.
author: Jannis R <mail@jannisr.de>

scripts.docs: node api-docs.js >docs/api.md && build-technical-doc --syntax-stylesheet-url /syntax.css <docs/readme.md >docs/index.html && build-technical-doc --syntax-stylesheet-url /syntax.css <docs/getting-started.md >docs/getting-started.html && build-technical-doc --syntax-stylesheet-url /syntax.css <docs/api.md >docs/api.html && build-technical-doc --syntax-stylesheet github >docs/syntax.css
